snippet: Tim Howard says he is not retiring, and hopes to return and compete for his job as the Americans’ No. 1 goalkeeper in September 2015.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; American goaltender Tim Howard, whose superlative shot-stopping nearly carried the United States national soccer team to the 2014 World Cup quarterfinals, announces that is taking a break from international play until fall of 2015; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tim Howard says he is not retiring, and hopes to return and compete for his job as the Americans’ No. 1 goalkeeper in September 2015.

headline.main: Tim Howard Taking One-Year Break From U.S. National Team
headline.print_headline: Howard Plans Hiatus From U.S. Team for Year

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations
